meanings.definition: A member of a collective farm in the former Soviet Union.
meanings.sent1: The kolkhozniks worked together on the farm.
meanings.sent2: The kolkhozniks harvested crops as a team.
meanings.sent3: The kolkhozniks had a big party after a successful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the kolkhozniks was as strong as the roots of the crops.
meanings.sent5: The kolkhozniks' dedication to farming was admirable.

meanings.sent1: Many kolkhozniks gathered for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: The kolkhozniks shared stories about their work.
meanings.sent3: The kolkhozniks' hats all looked the same.
meanings.sent4: In the field, the kolkhozniks moved like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The voices of the kolkhozniks echoed across the farm.
